name: Interdimensional Space Rescue
description:
Overview

The player plays as Jack, an interdimensional agent that travels through time and space to rescue civilians lost in the wrong dimension. I.S.R. is a third person adventure, escort mission-based game. 

Designers/Analyzers: Justin Wu, Megan Holden, Angel Jimenez, Tyler Grendel, Robert Martindale

3D Artists : Megan Holden, Tyler Grendel

2D Artist: Robert Martindale

Scripters: Justin Wu, Angel Jimenez

Goal 

To rescue civilians and safely escort them back to your ship.

Gameplay 

Player starts in a hub area and enters portals that lead to unique areas that contain a person they need to rescue. Player will receive missions and hints from friendly NPCs, along with general commentary. Avoid aggressive enemies, find your target, and then escort them back to the portal. 

Obstacles: enemies (melee and range), traps 

Mechanics: walk, teleport, avoid, deflect, rescue, interact w/ NPCs

Controls: 

[WASD] Walk

[E] shield

Art Style / Concept
